Didnt want to post a bug thread about this yet because I am not sure if it is a bug. But the last time I went into a saved game with my three astronauts on the Mun looking at their flag, the flag had changed from my chosen picture back to the standard Kerbal Space Program default white one. I had put some more flags in the folder since then but that shouldnt affect it.

Anyone else encountered this? Is it a bug?
Just a guess: did you remove your chosen flag from the folder?
